title: Running to stand still
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mental illness
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Homeless persons
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Community life
abstract: 'I was the poster boy for homeless bums trying to make good.'
description: Adrian Bush tells the story of how, after spending most of his life on the move, he found friendship and a sense of belonging playing street soccer in Fitzroy, Melbourne, with others from the Big Issue team. Adrian was selected for the Australian street soccer team, which toured internationally, and appeared in an ABC documentary. His experiences with the Big Issue and street soccer have transformed Adrian's life.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001791; Beyond the Big Issue : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2009
